text:
-kShantE paqvitraqM ~Mvai sauqmya AqtmAna#mEqva pa#vayantEq ya AqtmAnaqM na pa#riqpaSyE#diqtAsu#H syAdaBidaqdiM kRuqtvA&vE$kShEtaq tasmiqnaq. hyA$tmAna#M pariqpaSyaqtyathO# AqtmAna#mEqva pa#vayatEq yO gaqtama#nAqH syAth sO&vE$kShEtaq yanmEq manaqH parA#gataqM ~MyadvA# mEq apa#rAgataM | 
rAj~jAq sOmE#naq tadvaqyamaqsmAsu# dhArayAmaqsItiq mana# EqvAtman dA#dhAraq- [  ] 27
